implementation_output.changes_summary: Enhanced installer.py with exit codes (EXIT_SUCCESS=0, EXIT_FAILED=1, EXIT_CANCELLED=130), admin privilege check (check_privileges), preflight checks (run_preflight_checks: Python >= 3.10, disk space >= 500MB, write permissions), --managed-python flag for uv venv, pywin32 DLL configuration (configure_pywin32_dlls), --force and --port options for install command, and --all option for uninstall command. Updated uninstaller.py to support --all flag (removes all files without confirmation). Updated init_config to accept optional port parameter.

context_for_testing.notes: Implementation completed successfully. No high-risk elements detected (no unsafe subscripting, resource leaks, or type mismatches). All changes are stdlib-only additions with proper error handling. Syntax validation passed for both modified files.
